XFcRLESprite.h File Reference

XFcRLESprite.h is the header file for the XFcRLESprite class, which implements drawing and construction of RLE sprites. More...

Compounds

class  XFcRLESprite
 Class for drawing and constructing RLE compressed sprites. More...

Detailed Description

XFcRLESprite.h is the header file for the XFcRLESprite class, which implements drawing and construction of RLE sprites.
